Ease your mind
Calm your body
Increase your creativity

Use this opportunity to practice most common relaxation exercises in a warm, supportive group atmosphere.

This week's topic: Thinking and perception again! As suggested by one of the members I decided to expand on last week's topic and do another session focusing on observing and quieting our minds.
